value: caption=The castle of Malbork seen from across the river Nogat
Array of iron warriors in the courtyard of the Malbork Castle

There are two international trains going through Malbork:

value: 12h, one direct train daily, but there's only Berlin to Malbork train, there's no direct train from Malbork to Berlin
5h, one direct train daily, both ways

You can also get to Malbork from other Polish major cities:

value: 1,5h, several direct trains daily, the cheapest are Regio trains
8-14h, few direct trains daily, the cheapest are TLK trains
5h, few direct trains daily, the cheapest are TLK and InterRegio
6h, few direct trains daily, the cheapest are TLK, you can very easily reach Szczecin from Berlin

You can find the schedule on Polish Railways site:

value: you need to travel road #91 in Kraków direction, after that #22 to Malbork, other way is to travel A1 motorway in Kraków direction to Swarozyn exit, after that #22 to Malbork
you need to travel road #1 in Gdańsk direction, after that #22 to Malbork
you need to travel road #7 in Gdańsk direction, after that #22 to Malbork

, and few other polish cities.

. Site is only in Polish, but it is easy to use it, even if you don't know Polish.

value: For pricing and opening hours check
directions=Just few meters from the railway station under the old reservoir tower
content=Little themed pub combined with the greengrocery. Works only in summer. You practically sit outside, but it's covered.

content=The Zamek Hotel in Malbork is situated in the historic building of the former Teutonic hospital for lansquenets (foot soldiers), within the premises of the biggest Gothic castle in Europe. Double room 180 - 260 PLN depending on season. (2011)
content=Suitable prices (35 PLN), convenient location (few minutes walk from castle).

content=Best campsite in town. Offers places to strike tents, park a car or a mobile home. They also have a camping houses and a hotel. It's less than 1 km walk along the Nogat river to the castle.  Prices are per night as of 2011:  Per person fee: 14 zł, Small tent: 8 zł, Big tent: 14 zł, Car: 10 zł, Van: 18 zł, Campervan: 31 zł, Dog: 5 zł, Camping house (for 3 people with private bathroom): 150 zł (120 zł off season).
